user_questions.text: If we were to use ray dallio's 'playing card' idea for identifying skills and best practices for working with each other at Bloom.pm what are the different elements
user_questions.inspiration: Ray Dalio's baseball cards / playing cards
user_questions.metaphor: Magic The Gathering cards with skills and capacities

user_statements.text: remove Skill Set and Capacities, add more bits that can identify how best to work with my strengths and avoid my gaps
user_statements.significance: Focus on actionable collaboration strategies, not just assessment

decisions_visible.choice: Creating collaboration cards for Bloom program managers
decisions_visible.evidence: Detailed card template with strengths, gaps, collaboration tips

decisions_visible.choice: Focusing on 'how to work with me' vs raw skills assessment

concepts.name: Ray Dalio's Baseball Cards
concepts.description: Team member profiles with stats for optimal composition

explicit_values.quote: identify how best to work with my strengths and avoid my gaps
Communication preferences, decision-making style, feedback preferences

implicit_beliefs.belief: Teams perform better when they understand each other's strengths/gaps
implicit_beliefs.evidence: Creating systematic tool for mutual understanding
Removed skill ratings, added 'how to work with me' tips
Using baseball cards / Magic cards metaphor
Including values and motivations in cards

patterns.communication_style: Iterative design with AI, refining based on clarity
patterns.meta_pattern: Using management philosophy (Dalio) + game mechanics (MTG) for team tools

significance: Reveals Bilal's sophisticated team management approach at Bloom. Inspired by Ray Dalio's Principles, creating systematic self-awareness tool for program managers. Focus on actionable collaboration strategies (not just assessment). Shows commitment to transparency, values alignment, and optimal team composition. Part of broader Bloom program professionalization.

Bloom eon 2023 (Batches 1-2) - Team management for accelerator
Ray Dalio reference - Management philosophy influence

management_philosophy.innovation: Combining Dalio's approach with values/motivations and actionable collaboration tips

core_elements.gaps_awareness: Areas for growth with mitigation strategies

card_template_analysis.philosophy: Make implicit working styles explicit for better collaboration
card_template_analysis.use_case: Task assignment, team pairing, conflict prevention, onboarding
